They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by a British super spy to help guard the Queens precious objects while they are on display in the city.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A wild chase leads Jerry into the arms of a little girl, compelling Tom to try to help Jerry escape her clutches.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill. But things go from bad to worse when they discover the Gothic, old hospital is also home to a rampaging werewolf!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings’ boat, he could come closer to a zone that’s teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owner’s ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance that’s even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with laser party favors and are propelled onto an unknown planet: a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom hes a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trios success.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be outdone, Tom starts lifting weights as well – which sets up an epic Battle Royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are forced to go back to Detective School in order to renew their detective licenses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A werewolf terrorizes Tom and the inhabitants of the Catsylvania village.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms obsession with the sound his new crinkle ball makes drives the rest of the household crazy, forcing them to take drastic measures to rid the house of the annoying toy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to terrorize the mouse village forcing Jerry Van Mouseling to intervene and save the day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes part in a Fun Run. He starts next to his biggest enemy: the fat guy who stole his parking space. Fun Run or not, Bean is going to beat this guy at the finish line, even if he has to take a taxi along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean panics when a monster appears in his cake mix—but it’s a baby bird that grows into a huge stork, soon taking over his entire home!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about feeling sad.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its’ not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals they’re pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxation—and off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away – or worse.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill. But things go from bad to worse when they discover the Gothic, old hospital is also home to a rampaging werewolf!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to a Renaissance Faire where they must stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reign…permanently!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Daffys cool cousin Billy hires The Looney Builders to build her an art studio, Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isn’t listening to her crew.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light. / Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep. / Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some alone time to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship
programme.desc: For the second year in a row, Hac Sa Beach in Coloane serves as the venue for the MotoSurf World Championship Finale. The event marks the fifth and final stop of the tournament’s global tour. MotoSurf was officially recognised by the Union Internationale Motonautique (UIM) in 2019. The discipline uses motorised surfboards and requires a high degree of skill and control from athletes.

programme.title: Cape To Cape
programme.desc: Welcome to the home of Cape to Cape, Australia’s largest and most popular four day MTB stage race. programme.desc: We celebrate the nations emerging athletic talent, from the Olympic 4 × 400 meters relay teams record-breaking performance to Ross Branchs trailblazing achievements in the Dakar Rally and young tennis sensation Malak Machengs rise. Through their stories, we highlight Botswanas growing sports culture and its next generation of champions.

programme.title: Interview
programme.desc: Wolfgang Ischinger, Chairman of the Munich Security Conference, has warned that the end of the war in Ukraine would only be the start of European efforts to secure peace in Europe. programme.title: Truth Behind the Moon Landing
programme.desc: Some think the waving US flag on the moon proves that Nasa faked the lunar landing, and experts quest for the truth leads to some of Hollywoods biggest names.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The Iceman is the worlds oldest and most perfectly preserved mummy, and brand-new cutting-edge forensic technology is revealing his darkest secrets; these discoveries could change everything we know about the humans who lived 5,000 years ago.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The Emperor Nero built an astonishing palace in the heart of Rome. Now using cutting-edge technology, experts investigate if he burnt the city for the building.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look is taken at the manufacturing of various products to be assembled in a step-by-step factory process, featuring a glimpse into how wooden matches, tillage machines, telescopic gangways and mabe pearls are made.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Where materials come from and how manufacturing processes have developed over the years, featuring Chinese-style furniture, electrical switches, Thai fish sauce and cappers.

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at the worlds finest oyster knives, the lights transforming the worlds most popular sport and how pure diamonds grown in a greenhouse are creating a gemstone revolution.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at the process behind the making of cheddar, widely considered the worlds most popular cheese. Plus, the mechanisms inside Resusci Anne - the learning aid used to teach CPR.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do Ford produce the ubiquitous white van, the Transit? Plus, how do they ensure the Driza-bone coat lives up to its name?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they make wood burning stoves that bring warmth to the bleak Norwegian winter? Plus, how do build the synthesiser that changed music forever?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: The construction process behind the creation of the reinvented Morgan three-wheeler. Plus, the making of flame-retardant materials that help protect firefighters from burns.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they make wind turbines with twice the wingspan of a Boeing? Plus, how do they mould car tyres from the ooze of a tree?

programme.title: Extreme Engineering
programme.desc: Danny is in Brazil where they are building one of the worlds largest hydroelectric projects, tunnelling through seven mountains and building two dams.

programme.title: Savage Builds
programme.desc: Adam joins forces with a NASA engineer to rebuild a rocket-propelled super weapon. Originally built to breach barbed wire in WWII, they aim to fix its fatal flaws.

programme.title: Space Launch: Splashdown
programme.desc: NASA and SpaceX launch the first crewed mission from U.S. soil in almost ten years. Behind the scenes coverage of the SpaceX Dragon Capsule water landing.

programme.title: Legendary Locations
programme.desc: Explorer and host Josh Gates shares the mysteries behind some of the most legendary places on Earth, including an unbelievable Mesoamerican pyramid in the jungles of Central America and the mythology of the Ancient Greeks.

programme.title: Legendary Locations
programme.desc: Host Josh Gates tells the story of the medieval castle that inspired the lair of an infamous vampire count and a market in Munich, Germany where Santa Clauses demonic counterpart lurks in order to frighten holiday celebrators during Christmas.

programme.title: Legendary Locations
programme.desc: Josh Gates explores the Basilica church of St. Ursula in Germany, where the bones of 11,000 virgins are said to be buried, an ice cave in Japan that is supposedly guarded by the spirit of a dragon and a small, remote island that is populated by cats.

programme.title: Legendary Locations
programme.desc: Josh Gates investigates the mysterious disappearance of businessman Jim Thompson, who was last seen in the Cameron Highlands in Malaysia, the collapse of the ancient capital city of Angkor in Cambodia and the unique funeral traditions of Bolivia.

programme.title: American Titans
programme.desc: In the early days of the oil industry, refiners needed railroads and vice versa. Neither trusted the other, as dramatically illustrated by John D. Rockefellers Standard Oil and Thomas A. Scotts Pennsylvania Railroad.

programme.title: American Titans
programme.desc: In the late 1800s two great minds, Thomas Edison and Nikola Tesla, build systems that will dramatically change life by bringing light and power to the world.

programme.title: Truth Behind the Moon Landing

programme.title: Truth Behind the Moon Landing

programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Saatuaan hammaskeijulta viiden dollarin setelin, Bluey on innoissaan menossa Isan kanssa kauppoihin kayttamaan rahansa! Mutta tutkiessaan kauppojen hyllyja ystavansa Indyn kanssa, on yha vaikeampi ostaa jotain. Kun tarjolla on kaikkea hevoskyydeista pannukakkuihin, on vaikea valita! Paniikinomaisen herateostoksen johdosta Bluey harmittelee, ettei voi ostaa laulua katusoittajalta. Indyn vakuuttelu, etta ”sen minka taakseen jattaa, edestaan loytaa” pitaa paikkansa kun viiden dollarin seteli matkaa ympari kauppaa ja Bluey saa uuden mahdollisuuden.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Esihistorian hamarissa luolapojat Finias ja Ferb keksivat ensin pyoran ja sitten ensimmaisen auton. Candace yrittaa tietenkin karayttaa veljiaan ja keksii vahingossa samalla tulen. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. Finias, Ferb, Buford ja Baljeet lahtevat etsimaan nokkaelainmestari Perrya Jyrkimman Jyrkkyyden Jyrkkavuorelta pelastaakseen prinsessan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa – mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace innostuu kun pojat rakentavat jattiversion hanen lempilautapelistaan muuttamalla koko kaupungin Voropoli-pelilaudaksi. Silla valin Vanessa on telttaretkella ystaviensa kanssa ja tohtori Tollontyo pyytaa Perryn apua tyttarensa suojelemiseksi. / Kun Baljeet kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille sukunsa epaonnisesta polkupyorakilpailuhistoriasta, pojat rakentavat oman pyoraratansa, jotta han saisi voittaa. Silla valin Candace aikoo hankkia todisteita poikien puuhista uuden videokameransa avulla, mutta Tollontyon Ponnahdusnaattorin mainokset uhkaavat pilata hanen suunnitelmansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Isan sukulaiset tulevat kylailemaan Englannista. Silla aikaa kun isa kilpailee Adrian-veljeaan vastaan toinen toistaan hupsummissa asioissa, Ferb ja Finias todistavat jalkapallotaitonsa serkuilleen rakentamalla stadionin tarunhohtoista Jalkis X-Seiska-pelia varten. Kun Jeremy kehuu Eliza-serkun brittilaista puhetyylia, Candace paattaa oppia Elizalta, miten hienostuneet leidit kayttaytyvat.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Isan sukulaiset tulevat kylailemaan Englannista. Silla aikaa kun isa kilpailee Adrian-veljeaan vastaan toinen toistaan hupsummissa asioissa, Ferb ja Finias todistavat jalkapallotaitonsa serkuilleen rakentamalla stadionin tarunhohtoista Jalkis X-Seiska-pelia varten. Kun Jeremy kehuu Eliza-serkun brittilaista puhetyylia, Candace paattaa oppia Elizalta, miten hienostuneet leidit kayttaytyvat.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Pojat ovat ylpeita Perrysta, kun siita tehdaan Tyokalutuvan mainoskampanjan keulahahmo. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo uhkaa kaupunkia Viiksinaattorillaan ja Candace osallistuu seminaariin paastakseen eroon karayttamispakkomielteestaan, mutta lahtee loppujen lopuksi veljiensa peraan entista paattavaisempana. / Kun pojat heittavat tikkaa jattitikalla, aiti puuhastelee nykytaideprojektin kanssa – mutta Candace erehtyy luulemaan aidin jateveistosta poikien uusimmaksi keksinnoksi. Silla valin isa osallistuu vahingossa pahojen tiedemiesten jarjeston johtajakilpaan.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Bluey rakentaa itselleen taydellisen mielikuvitusleikkimokin sohvatyynyista, ja ilahtuu kun Bingo, Äiti ja Isa rakentavat omat talonsa naapuriin! Uusi naapurusto on fantastinen, kunnes Bingo valtaa Blueyn lukusopen kasvavalla elaintarhallaan! Koska ei tieda, miten ratkaista ongelma sopuisasti, Bluey kaantyy Äidin puoleen (jolla on omat ongelmansa aanekkaan Isan kanssa) puoleen. Äiti on Isan kanssa luja, mutta kohtelias, mika auttaa Blueyta loytamaan kompromisiin Bingon kanssa, ja rauha vallitsee taas pienen naapuruston kesken.

programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. programme.title: Eesti lipp umber maailma 25
programme.desc: 25 aastat tagasi alustas Piritalt teekonda jahtlaev Lennuk. Tehti midagi sellist, mida Eestis varem tehtud ei olnud – pooleteise aastaga sõideti vaikesel purjekal mooda traditsioonilisi mereteid umber maailma. Selle meresõidu patrooniks oli president Meri, seiklustele tormistel ookeanidel elasid kaasa kumned tuhanded reisi jalgijad. Režissoor Jaanus Nõgisto on võtnud kokku meremeeste mõtted toona ja nuud, veerand sajandit hiljem.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Eesti on jark-jargult suurendamas taastuvenergia tootmist, kuid kriitikud heidavad ette, et paikese- ja tuuleenergia on juhitamatud. Tegelikult arendatakse juba lahendusi, mis võimaldavad energiat salvestada ja suunata seda võrku vastavalt vajadusele. Uurime, millised võimalused selleks juba olemas on ja milline võiks olla valdkonna tulevik. Lõuna-Ameerikas, Kolumbia kõrgmaestikus elavad kogid, põlisrahvas, kes on aastatuhandeid jaanud truuks esivanemate õpetusele elades loodusega harmoonias. Sel kevadel kulastasid kogide esindajad Eestit, et oma teadmisi huvilistega jagada. Kohal oli mitmeid Eesti teadlasi, kes mõtisklesid selle ule, mida võiks laanemaailm kogi tarkadelt õppida. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Eesti lood
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm viib vaataja Eesti metsadesse, laboritesse ja rahvaparimuse radadele. Me kohtume teadlaste Maria Vikantjeva ja Julia Gelleriga, kes avavad meile puukide salaparase maailma, ning inimestega, kelle elusid on puugid puudutanud – naitleja Ivo Uukkivi, kes kogus kampaania „Pane puuk posti“ raames tuhandeid puuke, ja Sander Rebane, kes veetis haiglas nadalaid, võideldes puukentsefaliidiga ja -borrelioosiga. Film uurib puukide elu ja teaduslikku tausta, kuid laheb kaugemale – see peegeldab meie enda olemust. Kas inimene pole looduse „puuk“ – olend, kes võtab aina rohkem, andmata midagi vastu? Režissoor Madis Ligema loob poeetilise ja mõtlemapaneva vaatluse looduse tasakaalu ja inimese rolli ule selles hapras susteemis. Tootja Davai Laama.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased lahevad jalle teele. Seekord laanest itta ja ikka jalgsi. Ligi 680 km imelist Eestit koos lõbusate ja tarkade inimestega. 25 paeva jagu uusi katsumusi, matkateadmisi, loodustarkust, kohtumisi loomadega ja eksperimente inimkehaga. Esimeses osas liigume koos president Kersti Kaljulaidiga Matsalus, loeme kokku linde, loodusfilmide režissoor Joosep Matjus avab põtrade maailma, katsume aru saada kulapoe ees istumise fenomenist ja astume labi vanast raudteejaamast, kuhu on ennast sisse seadnud skulptorid. Lisaks loodustarkusi ja palju muud. Sarja autor Lemo, operaatorid Manuel Magi ja Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.

programme.title: Sõnakalender
programme.desc: Eesti Keele Instituudi Sõnakalender toob televaatajani uued sõnad, mis 2025. aastal leidsid tee Sõnaveebi EKI uhendsõnastikku. Iga paev tutvustavad uusi põnevaid sõnu ja nende tahendusi Helena Lotman ja Cristopher Rajaveer.

programme.title: Nõnda ka maa peal
programme.desc: Isa Lembit saab haiglast valja ja eitab uuesti igasugust abivajadust, ehkki on ilmselge, et tema peaga pole kõik korras ning raviga tuleks kiiremas korras alustada. Samal ajal laheneb Mariale kunagine kallim Taavi, kes on nuud Maria isa raviarst. Isa Lembitu endine rivaal Ruuben tahab Lembituga leppida ja korraldab toreda kalastusretke, mis lõpeb aga tõelise katastroofiga. Samal ajal muutub soojemaks Lembitu ja tema valismaalasest lapselapse Isabeli suhe. Lembit kukub uuesti kokku ja on selge, et operatsiooniga tuleb kiirustada. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissoor Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Valimised on Mornas labi ja Oliver-Sten võitis. Tema aga Maige utsitamisest hoolimata seda kohta ei taha ja tundub, et linnapeaks võib saada hoopis Margit. Tiik on lisaks kaotusele keeranud endale kokku kohutava jama koos sekretar Teresa ja Arega. Alma, Laine ja Harald arutavad e-haalte legitiimsust. Mare naitab Filipile skandaalseid pilte.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Elu labi Saatse saapa
programme.desc: Saatse saapas ule kolme aastakumne kehtinud kurioosne olukord, kus meie inimesed võisid vabalt sõita labi Venemaa territooriumi, on nuud labi saanud. Seda kuidas me Saatse saapa endale uldse saime ja mismoodi peavad nuud siinsed kohalikud elanikud ilma selle saapata elama ja hakkama saama, uurib autor- saatejuht Mirjam Mõttus. Režissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Pealtnagija on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni põnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaaže sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat, Margit Kilumets ja Uljana Kuzmina. Režissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kumme kaadrit
programme.desc: Saatejuht Kristjan Jõekalda kulaliseks on Raul Rebane, kes on oma isiklikust fotoalbumist otsinud valja kumme huvitavat kaadrit.

programme.title: Pintsel pausile. Kunstihoone kolib
programme.desc: 1934. aastal avatud Tallinna Kunstihoone laheb remonti. Kaisime kulas kuulsatel kunstnikel, kes meenutavad kaunemaid ja lõbusamaid hetki, mis selles majas kogetud. Tana on Marko Maetammel 60. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Vaike Tiina unistas iluuisutamisest ja võitudest sel alal. Trauma aga pani tudruku erinevaid lahendusi otsima ja tana saab Tiina Grossi juures lennata. Flygrossing pakub rõõmu igas eas inimestele. Kusib Reet Linna, režissoor Kertu Koosel, toimetaja Marika Kaasik, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Metsades elab kaks kolmandikku kõigist maailma imetajaliikidest. Saame koos Sir David Attenboroughga teada, kuidas uletada ulerahvastatud metsades elamise valjakutsed.

programme.title: 4x4. Island
programme.desc: Sarja kolmandas osas proovitakse siit ja sealt ihaldusvaarsele ning elu esimesele liustikule ligi saada. Augustikuine lumetorm on aga vastu, sulgedes kõik põhjapoolsed teed. Suured kosed ja joad voolavad seevastu endiselt, pakkudes eelmisel ool kulmunud lihastele ning kontidele kauaigatsetud liikumist. Liustikule lisaks jaavad teele ulpivad jaakolakad, esimesed Islandi maitsed, uhke kanjon ja laavavaljad. Režissoor Vaino Laisaar, tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Sel korral on Eesti mang teatrilainel. Kulas on Temufi teatri tegijad Peep Maasik, Martin Aulis ja Silver Kaljula. Saadet juhib alati heatujuline Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Loomaaia varavasse on kerkinud kahekorruseline maja, mille planeerimisele ja ehitamisele on kulunud noorte elust kaks aastat. Mirge raagib, kui lihtne või keeruline see aeg on neile olnud. Risto tutvustab uut mustilist lemmiklooma Zumat. Mirge viib skunk Noobiku Muhusse veterinaari juurde operatsioonile. Risto naitab vaatajale, millistes tingimustes saab pidada eksootilisi konnasid ja keda peab neile soogiks kasvatama. Loomaaias on vaga tahtis roll taluloomadel, keda saab paitada ja porgandiga soota. Saame veel teada, kuidas saabusid nende juurde elama eesel Sehvi ja kits Kusti. Saate tegijad Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK OÜ.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Viiendas osas raagib oma tervisest muusik Heini Vaikmaa, kes aasta tagasi elas ule ajuinfarkti. Kuidas mitte pilli põõsasse visata ja elutervelt edasi toimetada? Kuidas aitab fusioteraapia keha uuesti sõna kuulama panna ja mida võiks tervisele anda maalikursusel kaimine? Neile ja paljudele teistele kusimustele saab saates vastuse. Saatejuht Kaidor Kaidor Kahar, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder ja produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Anneli ostab Are korteri ara. Allan teatab Marele, et tal on uus idee, kuhu toole minna. Margit ja Oliver-Sten sõlmivad koalitsioonilepingu, Tiiki see muidugi muserdab. Tiina kutsub Henry suureks ullatuseks Laine neile modelliks.

programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Outrageous
programme.desc: Diana ootab Mosley last. Unity tahab Saksamaale keelt õppima minna ja vaimustub seal Hitlerist. Peter on tootu, tema ja Nancy on suurtes võlgades. Dianale teeb muret, et Nancy kirjutab romaani, mis naeruvaaristab Mosley fašistlikku liikumist, kuid Nancyl on hadasti raha vaja.

programme.title: Paremad ajad
programme.desc: Kolm venda - Oscar, Lukas ja Karl lahevad kulla oma isale, kus saavad teada, et nende perele kuuluv pagaritookoda on pankroti aarel. Peagi selgub, et olukord on palju tõsisem, kui nad esialgu arvasid. Nuud peavad nad uhtse perena pingutama, et pagaritookoda paasta. Seda tehes tuleb neil silmitsi seista leinaga, mille tõi ema kaotus ja mis on neid uksteisest lahutanud. Soe ja sudamlik draama kolmest vennast ja nende isast ning sellest, kuidas nad tulevad toime ema kaotusega. Filmis on nii naeru kui ka suurt sudamlikkust kolme venna omavahelises suhtlemises. R: Milad Schwartz Avaz. O: Caspar Phillipson, Andreas Jessen, Lars Brygmann.

programme.title: Üks mu sõber
programme.desc: Parast naise surma ei taha Mati (Aarne Ükskula) enam elada. Naine oli kogu tema elu, uksi pole elul mõtet. Kuigi tal on too raamatukogus ja seal on tema kõrval Ruth (Rita Raave), kes on teda aastaid salaja armastanud. Tutar Mari (Harriet Toompere) on aga oma eluga nii puntras, et vajaks ise abi. Mati tahaks lihtsalt ara. Siis ilmub ei tea kust pusimatu Sass (Aleksander Eelmaa), kõigi hadaliste sõber. Sass hakkab Matit elama õpetama. Matil on nuud sõber, kellest on peaaegu et võimatu lahti saada. Üks mu sõber on Mart Kivastiku kirjutatud-lavastatud sudamlik draamakomoodia põhjatust uksindusest, mida saab ravida ainult sõpruse abil. Osades Aarne Ükskula, Aleksander Eelmaa, Rita Raave, Harriet Toompere, Ingmar-Erik Kiviloo, Markus Luik, Tõnu Oja, Sulev Teppart, Raivo Adlas. Režissoor Mart Kivastik, produtsent Anneli Ahven.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Kuna gangsterid on mangust valjas, tuleb Elleni mõrvarit otsida kohalike seast. Selleks hakkavad uurijad kaevama naise minevikus ja leiavadki sobiva lapsepõlvesõbra, ent kui Elleni surnukeha varastatakse, loob see kõik kaardid segi.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Metsades elab kaks kolmandikku kõigist maailma imetajaliikidest. Saame koos Sir David Attenboroughga teada, kuidas uletada ulerahvastatud metsades elamise valjakutsed.

programme.title: Rahvuspargid
programme.desc: Eesti rahvusparkide loodust, ajalugu ja kultuuriparandit tutvustavate videotega tahistame Eesti looduskaitse 110. aastapaeva. Just rahvusparkides saab kogeda ehedat loodust ning inimese ja looduse harmoonilist kooskõla. Hingematvalt ilusate kaadritega videod aitavad mõista rahvusparkide vaartusi ja loodetavasti ahvatlevad loodusesõpru avastama rahvusparkide senitundmata radu. Videod valmisid Keskkonnaameti ja OÜ Tammik Filmi koostoos.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Loomaaia varavasse on kerkinud kahekorruseline maja, mille planeerimisele ja ehitamisele on kulunud noorte elust kaks aastat. Mirge raagib, kui lihtne või keeruline see aeg on neile olnud. Risto tutvustab uut mustilist lemmiklooma Zumat. Mirge viib skunk Noobiku Muhusse veterinaari juurde operatsioonile. Risto naitab vaatajale, millistes tingimustes saab pidada eksootilisi konnasid ja keda peab neile soogiks kasvatama. Loomaaias on vaga tahtis roll taluloomadel, keda saab paitada ja porgandiga soota. Saame veel teada, kuidas saabusid nende juurde elama eesel Sehvi ja kits Kusti. Saate tegijad Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK OÜ.

programme.title: Sõnakalender
programme.desc: Eesti Keele Instituudi Sõnakalender toob televaatajani uued sõnad, mis 2025. aastal leidsid tee Sõnaveebi EKI uhendsõnastikku. Iga paev tutvustavad uusi põnevaid sõnu ja nende tahendusi Helena Lotman ja Cristopher Rajaveer.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Viiendas osas raagib oma tervisest muusik Heini Vaikmaa, kes aasta tagasi elas ule ajuinfarkti. Kuidas mitte pilli põõsasse visata ja elutervelt edasi toimetada? Kuidas aitab fusioteraapia keha uuesti sõna kuulama panna ja mida võiks tervisele anda maalikursusel kaimine? Neile ja paljudele teistele kusimustele saab saates vastuse. Saatejuht Kaidor Kaidor Kahar, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder ja produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Jõulumeeleolus stuudios kõlab muusika, millega meenuvad kõige helgemad malestused. Lia Virkus jagab oma detsembrisse sobivat retsepti ja Reet Linna uurib missugused margid on tekstiilikunstnik Elna Kaasik põiminud piiskopiruudesse.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Kui Eestimaal hakkas rahvuslik liikumine jumet võtma, ei haaranud eestlane mitte pussi, vaid hoopis hirmsama relva - pasuna! Saatejuhtidel Priit ja Mart Piusil aitavad arkamisajas orienteeruda Jurgen Rooste, Rasmus Puur, Indrek Laul, Kadi Polli ja paljud teised. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ning kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Luiskajad
programme.desc: Kuidas tunda lõbusate luiskejuttude seast ara naljakas tõestisundinud lugu? See ulesanne pole kerge, eriti kui oma senikuulmata varvikaid eluseiku raagivad Jan Uuspõld, Sepo Seeman ja Peeter Oja. Ka vaatajad on teretulnud osalema, et valja selgitada, kes neist kolmest jaab faktitruuks ja kes ajab kelbast. Jutujuga juhib Anu Valba.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Margus Ader, kohapealt teeb intervjuusid Ivar Lepik.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Kaime harrastuspuudjatega Lammijarve jaal ja tutvume talvise kalapuugi isearasustega. Autor-saatejuht Sander Loite.

programme.title: Laskesuusatamise MK-etapp
programme.desc: Kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Margus Ader, kohapealt teeb intervjuusid Ivar Lepik.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Kui murukeegli klubi murult leitakse eakas kohtunik tapetuna, sukelduvad Barnaby ja Winter klubi segaste suhete ja hamarate aride maailma.

programme.title: Meie õpetajad
programme.desc: Meie õpetajad jargmises osas kohtume Matilde Matverega - tallinlannaga, kes jattis sel aastal oma too filmikunsti maailmas ja kolis Narva. Eesti keele ja kirjanduse õpetajana aitab Matilde nuud Narva noortel tugevat keelepõhja luua. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: Sel nadalal jõudsid meediaruumi uudised Ukraina uksuste edenemisest Pokrovskis ja ka Kupjanskis. Kas need teated on kinnitust leidnud ja kui palju on Ukraina venelaste poolt hõivatud alasid suutnud tagasi võtta, seda uurime Ukraina stuudios kolonel Janno Margilt. USA avaldab president Zelenskile survet nõustuma rahuplaaniga, mille detailidest ei ole ulearu palju teada. Kõige ebaselgem on Ukrainale antavate julgeolekugarantiide osa. Millised saaksid uldse olla garantiid, mis tagaksid Ukrainale kindluse Venemaa edasiste runnakute suhtes, seda selgitab kindralmajor reservis Neeme Vali. Saatejuht on Reimo Sildvee. Toimetaja Peep Kala, režissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Maailm ja mõnda
programme.desc: Naeme kelgusõitu asfaldil, mida korraldatakse ainult Madeiral; banaani beebisid; elusat espaada kala; pronksist Ronaldot; maalitud uksi Funchali vanalinnas ja sedagi, kuidas kalad vahetavad sugu. Madeira kalurite lemmikjook on poncha ja saates naeme, kuidas seda valmistatakse. Winston Churchill maalis kunagi saarel uht populaarset randa, mille nimi on Câmara de Lobos. Fanali looduspark on nagu urgne muinasjutt ja Palheiro botaanikaaed inspireerib oma iluga igat kulastajat. Madeiral filmisid Andres Dvinjaninov, Tiina Park ja Peeter Ülevain. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Juurdlus on ummikus. Need, kellel oli Geraldi tapmiseks motiiv, polnud sundmuskohal, ja neil, kes seal olid, puudus motiiv. Dementsel Dalorisel on tunne, et ta maletab Debbiest midagi olulist. Neville kurdab emale, et tal pole armastuses uldse õnne.

programme.title: Eesti imelised aastaajad
programme.desc: Paevavalguse aeg on uha pikemaks lainud ja talve ramm hakkab tasapisi raugema. Mõni paev sulatab, teine paev kulmetab taas või toob taevast veel valgeid helbeid. Loodusega sidet ja seal veedetud aega hindab kõrgelt fotograaf Hele-Mai Alamaa, kes valmistab kohalikust toorainest vabas õhus maitsvat toitu.

programme.title: Ridade vahel
programme.desc: Suislepa on vaid paarisaja elanikuga kulake Viljandi vallas, ometi on Suislepa andnud Eestile uhe olulisema eestlaseks olemise mõtestaja - kirjaniku ja semiootiku Valdur Mikita. Saates arutletakse, kas kukeseene kuulamise kunstnikus saabki vaid pisikesest maakohast võrsunud kirjanik ja milline roll võiks olla raamatukogul uhe õige eestlase kujunemisel. Saatejuht Ave-Marleen Rei, režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Ludwig
programme.desc: Lucy satub mõrvaloo keskmesse ja nuud keskenduvad kõik pilgud Johnile. Jamesi otsingud jaavad tagaplaanile, kuna John võitleb meeleheitlikult, et tõestada Lucy suutust.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Tasapisi liigub juurdlus aina lahemale Elleni kodule ja perekonnale ning aastakumneid varjatud saladusele. Ruthi ja Toshi teed lahevad vahepeal lahku, kuid lõpuks jõutakse ikkagi õige mõrvarini ning Ruth teeb ka rahu oma mineviku ja kodusaarega.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Restorani avamiseni on jaanud veel vaid uks paev. Viimased ettevalmistused kaivad ja loomulikult jaab ajast natuke puudu. Avatakse pikalt valminud soogilaud, valmistatakse suppi ja tehakse viimistlustoid. Kes katab laua? Kes valab veini? Paljud vastuseta kusimused on ootamatult õhus ja vajavad kiireid lahendusi. Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Mart Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissoor Mikk Jurjens, produtsent Eero Reinu.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.desc: Antti Hanhivaaran katoaminen syksylla v. 2006 on noussut Suomen tunnetuimmaksi katoamismysteeriksi useastakin eri syysta. Tapauksen tiimoilta nousee liian monta kysymysmerkkia esille niin Antin ystavien vuoksi kuin paikallisen poliisin toimesta tai paremminkin sanottuna toimimattomuudesta. programme.title: Isannoitsijat
programme.desc: K1 J10 Paatosjaksossa kuulemme mietteita isannoitsijan tyosta ja jaksamisesta seka seuraamme valmistautumista Taloaseman paiviin Hameelinnassa. Naemme myos kuka on vuoden Taloasemalainen.

programme.title: Remppaa ja Sisusta

programme.title: Hellapoliisi
programme.desc: K8 J10 Kauden paatosjaksossa puhutaan erittain mielenkiintoisesta asiasta, nimittain testamentista. Tiesitko etta aviopuolisisot eivat peri toisiaan? Tahan ja moneen muuhun kysymykseen vastaa lakimies Maiju Rihtniemi. Kati ja Maiju kokkailevat muun muassa burgundin pataa ja juustokakkua. Resepti: hellapoliisi.fi. Tuotanto Hellapoliisi Oy 2025.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Yha loytamatta - Antti Hanhivaara
programme.desc: Antti Hanhivaaran katoaminen syksylla v. 2006 on noussut Suomen tunnetuimmaksi katoamismysteeriksi useastakin eri syysta. Tapauksen tiimoilta nousee liian monta kysymysmerkkia esille niin Antin ystavien vuoksi kuin paikallisen poliisin toimesta tai paremminkin sanottuna toimimattomuudesta. Tama tutkimus vakuutti meidat siita, etta rajan takana saattaisi olla auttajia kuin myos tutkimuksia haittaavia tahoja vastaamassa.

programme.desc: Mmm … can you smell it? The sweet aroma of cinnamon rolls baking in the oven, or is it the pumpkin-spiced latte youre sipping? programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris digging into a world of flavour with unexpected dumplings in Oregon, real deal mofongo in Utah and coal-fired pizza in Nashville.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Old-school picture postcards are making a comeback as a fun way to share the magic of Christmastime vacations with loved ones back home, so hosts Ree Drummond and Eddie Jackson challenge four festive cookie makers to create two-sided Christmas postcards. One cookie maker will have their postcard stamped return to sender, while the cookie maker who best pushes the envelope will win an advantage for the next round. Then, the merry trip continues as the three remaining cookie makers craft 360-degree Christmas camper vans while incorporate outdoorsy favorites like granola bars, fruit leather, almond butter packets or instant oatmeal. The cookie maker who makes the coolest camper will scamper home with $10,000 and the Golden Ornament.

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: Mestarivaras Max Burdett vetaytyy viimeisen ryoston jalkeen paratiisisaarelle kauniin kumppaninsa kanssa nauttimaan kovan tyon tuloksista. Hanen elinikainen vastustajansa, viekas FBI-agentti Stan, rantautuu saarelle varmistamaan, etta varas pitaa lupauksensa. Tarjolla on Napoleonin viimeinen timantti - kayko kiusaus liian suureksi Maxille, ja saako Stan hanet lopultakin nalkkiin? 97 min. Ohjaus: Brett Ratner. Paaosissa: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek ja Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Tehtyaan tavalliselta vaikuttavan pidatyksen miehesta, joka paljastelee itseaan Keskuspuistossa, etsiva Rollinsilla (Kelli Giddish) on ilkea tunne epailtya kohtaan ja kutsuu koko SVU-tiimin ja ADA Barban (Raul Esparza) apuun. Kun epaillyn todellista identiteettia ei onnistuta selvittamaan, tama mestarillisesti vetaa pitemman korren joka kerta. Jarkyttava teoria tulee esille, ja kun Barban oikeudenkaynti lahestyy, tilanne nopeasti eskaloituu ja etsiva Benson (Mariska Hargitay) joutuu hengenvaaraan.
